name: Peryton
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The peryton attacks with its gore and talons.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. This attack scores a critical hit on a roll of 18  19  or 20. If this critical hit reduces a humanoid to 0 hit points  the peryton can use a bonus action to rip the targets heart out with its teeth  killing it.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage  or 10 (2d6 + 3) damage if the peryton moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The peryton has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight or smell.
